original_text: “‘Now this was the sin of your sister Sodom: She and her daughters were arrogant, overfed and unconcerned; they did not help the poor and needy.
korean_text: 네 아우 소돔의 죄악은 이러하니 그와 그의 딸들에게 교만함과 음식물의 풍족함과 태평함이 있음이며 또 그가 가난하고 궁핍한 자를 도와 주지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: Now this was the sin of your sister Sodom:
She and her daughters were arrogant,
they did not help the poor and needy.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 가난하고 궁핍한 자를 도와주지 않았다.
